Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/37th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB:Kedzie, Pershing, California and 36th Pl.; SB Kedzie, 36th, California and Pershing :due to, street blockage near Kedzie/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie//37th due to street blockage near Kedzie/37th.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Pershing, California and 36th Place including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 36th, California and Pershing..

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Harold Washington Library
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Harold Washington Library due to a report of fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Harold Washington Library due to a report of fire department activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
